body_html:
This is more like a Stack Overflow question than a bug.

You could try using a control-flow operator like tf.map_fn() to loop over tiles of your image and accumulate the gradients, or switch to using Eager Execution and sum the gradients manually.

body:
This is more like a Stack Overflow question than a bug.

You could try using a control-flow operator like `tf.map_fn()` to loop over tiles of your image and accumulate the gradients, or switch to using Eager Execution and sum the gradients manually.
